show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips discuss the decision to drop the atomic bomb at the end of World War II, was it... <!--more--> necessary as the official historical narrative suggests?
Our guests today challenge that narrative and bring the conversation to another level.
We’re joined by Minister Nobuaki Hanaoka, Nagasaki bombing survivor; Professor Jacques Pauwels, author of The Myth of the Good War; and Andrew Phillips who talks about his interview with Wilfred Burtchett (one of the first journalists on the ground at Hiroshima after the bomb dropped)
